page.title: 08Local Issues
page.content: A new pub is being built in Wormit despite objections from some people who thought it would be undesirable. Most adults think that building a pub is a good idea because it means that they can get together socially without having to drive anywhere. However, the children disagree for they would have liked a BMX track instead. There is some pressure to have a new rail halt built at Wormit but others don't like the idea, saying that the money could be put to better use. New houses are developing all over Wormit. The majority of people think this is a good idea for it will bring more people and possibly more trade to the Newport area. However, some do think that the land should be used for children's play areas.
